sentences.en: a statue of a horse cast in bronze
sentences.cn: 青铜马铸像

sentences.en: Alexandra looked plump and awkward in her cast-off clothing.
sentences.cn: 亚历山德拉穿着那身过时的衣裳，显得臃肿笨拙。

sentences.en: An orthodontist took a cast of the inside of Billy's mouth.
sentences.cn: 正畸医生从比利的口腔内部取了模型。

sentences.en: Burke cast a cursory glance at the menu, then flapped it shut.
sentences.cn: 伯克匆匆地瞥了一眼菜单，然后啪地合上了。

sentences.en: By 09.30 we had cast off and were heading down-river.
sentences.cn: 9点30分时我们就解缆向下游出发了。

sentences.en: cast about for new ways to proceed.
sentences.cn: 尽力找到进行下去的新方法

sentences.en: cast around for solutions to the problem.
sentences.cn: 寻找解决问题的办法

sentences.en: cast off a boat; cast off a line.
sentences.cn: 解开船；放开钓线

sentences.en: cast off old clothing.
sentences.cn: 扔掉旧衣服

sentences.en: For many years sundials have cast their spell over scientists and mathematicians.
sentences.cn: 多年来，日晷一直吸引着科学家和数学家们。

sentences.en: Four of the cast jacked it in about Christmas.
sentences.cn: 圣诞节前后剧组中有4个人退出了。

sentences.en: had to cast about for an hour, looking for a good campsite.
sentences.cn: 为了找一个好的露营地，不得不寻觅一个小时

sentences.en: he cast his mind back to the fatal evening.
sentences.cn: 他回忆起那不幸的傍晚。

sentences.en: he is restlessly casting about for novelties.
sentences.cn: 他为了求新而不停思索。

sentences.en: He walked to the local polling centre to cast his vote.
sentences.cn: 他走到当地的投票中心投了票。

sentences.en: he was cast in a cautious mould.
sentences.cn: 他生性谨慎。

sentences.en: he was cast in a cautious mould.
sentences.cn: 他生性谨慎。

sentences.en: he was cast in a cautious mould.
sentences.cn: 他生性谨慎。

sentences.en: he was invited to cast his eyes over the exhibition.
sentences.cn: 他应邀粗略参观一下展览。

sentences.en: he was invited to cast his eyes over the exhibition.
sentences.cn: 他应邀粗略参观一下展览。

sentences.en: he was invited to cast his eyes over the exhibition.
sentences.cn: 他应邀粗略参观一下展览。

sentences.en: Most of the cast was amazed by the play's success.
sentences.cn: 大多数演员都为该剧大获成功而感到惊奇。

sentences.en: Our door knocker is cast in solid brass.
sentences.cn: 我们的门环是纯铜铸造的。

sentences.en: She cast a wry glance in her grandmother's direction.
sentences.cn: 她朝奶奶无可奈何地瞟了一眼。

sentences.en: Sparks leapt as he cast more wood on the fire.
sentences.cn: 他往火里投进更多的木块，火星四处飞溅。

sentences.en: The cast of characters in the scandal is bewilderingly large.
sentences.cn: 卷入丑闻的人多得让人眼花缭乱。

sentences.en: The girl was a mirage, cast up by his troubled mind.
sentences.cn: 那个女孩是他的幻觉，是他那忧郁不安的头脑妄想出来的。

sentences.en: the shade cast by low-hanging branches
sentences.cn: 低垂的树枝投下的阴影

sentences.en: The show is very amusing and the cast are very good.
sentences.cn: 演出妙趣横生，演员的表演也很出彩。

sentences.en: The whole cast executed the production with truly professional aplomb.
sentences.cn: 全体演职人员以一种真正的专业精神，从容不迫地开始了影片的制作。

sentences.en: There are factors, however, that have cast doubt on the statue's authenticity.
sentences.cn: 然而，有些因素让人对该雕塑的真伪产生了怀疑。

sentences.en: They would have to offer cast-iron guarantees to invest in long-term projects.
sentences.cn: 他们需提供绝对可靠的担保，才能投资长期项目。

words.tran_cn: 铸造；铸件；投掷；角色分配
铸造；投掷；投向；选派演员；扔掉（cast的ing形式）
投，抛垂钓鱼钩；计算，把几个数字加起来

phrases.phrase: cast about (或 around 或 round)

phrases.tran_cn: v. 使沮丧；使下降；推翻
&I{【印刷术】} 估计排版的空间：估计一篇手稿排版时所占的篇幅

phrases.phrase: cast one's bread upon the waters

trans.tran_cn: 全体演员，模子，特征，外貌，投，抛
trans.tran_en: all the people who perform in a play, film etc
to make light or a shadow appear somewhere

trans.tran_cn: 瞥，投射(光线)，投(票)，扔，抛，挑选(演员)，描述，浇铸
